SELECT vi.*, si.code, si.name as staffName, si.sex, si.images as staffImages, si.create_date, si.phone, si.address, si.ethnicity, si.real_name, si.id_number, si.birth_date, si.id_card_front_images, si.id_card_reverse_images, si.service_score FROM vehicle_info vi LEFT JOIN staff_info si ON (si.id = vi.staff_id) WHERE 1 = 1
AND si.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{queryParam.staffName},'%')
AND vi.vehicle_no LIKE CONCAT('%',#{queryParam.vehicleNo},'%')
AND si.user_id = #{queryFrom.staffId}
ORDER BY vi.create_date DESC
